account_code_box_empty.description: [GTR] Accounting code neets to be at least one character for the box to accept an entry. shown as toast/snackbar to user (temporary on screen message)
account_code_box_empty.message: Veuillez fournir un code comptable à imprimer

config_cache_deleted.description: [GTL] Notify the user the printer config cache has been deleted

credit_copy.description: [GTR] The remaining print page limits in page values

credit_print.description: [GTR] The remaining print page limits in page values

credit_value.description: [GTR] Amount of credit remaining to print with (in currency)

dpio_edge_node_sign_in.description: [GTL] Link to show a popup to sign in as an Edge Node
dpio_edge_node_sign_in.message: Connectez-vous en tant que dpio Edge Node

edge_node_select_title.description: [GTL] title when prompting the user to select an Edge Node

edge_print_auth_cleared.description: [GTL] Notify the user the printer Edge Print authorization has been cleared

environment_quickcode.description: [GTL] State that the allocation was via an OS. Environment Variable settting QuickCodes

error_with_status_code.description: [GTL] Show an error with a given status code

follow_me_app_value.description: [GTL] Button text for the user selecting to show the release app install
follow_me_app_value.message: Afficher l'installation de l'application de la version

ink_save_2_up.description: [GTL] Whether to print 2 pages side by side to every one sheet of paper (checkbox)

ink_save_best.description: [GTL] The best quality ink save profile (no ink saving)

ink_save_dont_print_blank.description: [GTL] Whether to skip over printing blank pages during the print (checkbox)

ink_save_dont_print_nblank.description: [GTL] Whether to skip over printing nearly blank pages during the print (checkbox)
ink_save_dont_print_nblank.message: N'imprimez pas de pages presque vierges

ink_save_estimated_saving.description: [GTL] The amount of ink that can be saved by using the current ink save profile instead of "Best"
ink_save_estimated_saving.message: Estimation de l'utilisation de l'encre de la page par rapport à la "Meilleure" qualité

ink_save_printing_xofx.description: [GTL] Notify the number of pages against total pages to be printed

ink_save_saving.description: [GTL] A percentage of the amount of ink being saved

ink_save_tooltip_best.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "best" ink saving option

ink_save_tooltip_draft.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "draft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_draft.message: Supprime toutes les couleurs, réduit l'intensité du noir pour économiser l'encre/le toner

ink_save_tooltip_mono.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "mono" ink saving option

ink_save_tooltip_saver.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "saver" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_saver.message: Utilise moins de toner/encre tout en conservant les images et le texte

ink_save_tooltip_superdraft.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "superdraft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_superdraft.message: Supprime toutes les couleurs, réduit encore plus l'intensité du noir

ink_save_tooltip_ultradraft.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "ultradraft" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_ultradraft.message: Supprime toutes les couleurs, supprime la plupart des images

ink_save_tooltip_zap.description: [GTL] tooltip popup for "image zap" ink saving option
ink_save_tooltip_zap.message: Profil d'utilisation d'encre encore plus réduit

ink_save_ultradraft.description: [GTL] (very very draft) Ultradraft ink usage profile

job_account_code_entry_choose.description: [GTL] Placeholder text for the dropdown seleciton box to pick an accounting code

job_account_code_entry_fill.description: [GTL] Placeholder text for the freeform entry box to enter an accounting code

job_account_code_entry_text.description: [GTL] to follow on with job_account_code_entry_title, jobname on printername

job_account_code_entry_title.description: [GTL] Title for modal popup requiring the user to input an accounting code

job_make_default_check.description: [GTL] Text for checkbox to make the current code default for the next time

job_multiple_copies.description: [GTL] Number of copies of the current job to print (multiple)

job_no_jobs.description: The placeholder text for when there are no current print jobs

job_popup_cancel.description: [GTL] Notification to user as they are cancelling a print job
job_popup_cancel.message: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir annuler ce travail?

job_single_copy.description: [GTL] Number of copies of the current job to print (singular)

job_state_acc_code_select.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is awaiting the user to select and accounting code

job_state_back_off.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is awaiting retry on a printer

job_state_claimed.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been claimed by another print node

job_state_complete.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been completed

job_state_converted.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been converted

job_state_converting.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is converting

job_state_created.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been created

job_state_download_failed.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job download has failed and it's awaiting to retry

job_state_downloading.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is downloading from the cloud

job_state_error.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has errored and will not continue

job_state_follow_me_prompt.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is awaitng the user to confirm the follow-me prompt

job_state_invalid.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is in an unknown/invalid state

job_state_pin_required.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is awaiting PIN release

job_state_printer_stalled.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been stalled due to a printer issue

job_state_printing.description: [GTL] The job is currently printing on the printer $PRINTER_NAME$

job_state_queued.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is queued waiting for printer availability

job_state_started.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been started

job_state_uploading.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is uploading to the cloud

job_state_user_cancelled.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job has been cancelled by the user

job_state_user_input.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is waiting for user input

job_state_validating_acc.description: [GTL] Current job state - the job is validating the given accounting code

nav_add.description: [GTL] Clickable button for adding an option

nav_cancel.description: [GTL] Clickable button to cancel a prompt

nav_enter.description: Clickable button to enter some input

nav_print.description: [GTL] Clickable button to continue to print

nav_printers.description: [GTL] shorthand for 'Active Printer List', link to page

nav_queue.description: [GTL] shorthand for 'Print Queue', link to page

nav_remove.description: Clickable button for removing an option

nav_yes.description: [GTL] Clickable button for yes on a notification

no_id.description: [GTL] Stating that there is no ID found

not_available.description: [GTL] statement that the given settings value is currently not available

printer_advanced.description: [GTL] Clickable text to go to printer advanced options from menu drop down

printer_icon_unavailable.description: [GTL] The printer is not available for use

printer_tests_ipps_available.description: [GTL] Printer can connect via IPPS protocol

printer_tests_port_closed.description: [GTL] Connection status result when the printer can't connect on the given port

printer_tests_port_connecting.description: [GTL] Connection status result during test run

printer_tests_port_not_available.description: [GTL] Connection status result for network test stack not being available

printer_tests_port_title.description: [GTL] Status of connecting to the printer on port $NUMBER$

printer_tests_title.description: [GTL] Tests to run against the printer

printer_tests_usb.description: [GTL] Printer connnected via USB protocol, other protocols not applicable
